channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'Weaponized AI' could be the biggest security threat facing your business this year - here's what experts say you should be on the lookout for
item.description: AI-driven cybercrime is escalating rapidly, combining phishing, deepfakes, and Dark LLMs, forcing businesses to strengthen defences and monitoring systems.

item.title: Test de la Realme Watch 5 : une montre connectée au design ultra, mais au prix mini
item.description: Proposée à moins de 100 euros, la nouvelle Realme Watch 5 reprend un design de montre « Ultra » avec une autonomie généreuse et un suivi GPS. Voici son test complet.

item.title: A new test for AI labs: Are you even trying to make money?
item.description: It’s getting hard to tell which AI labs. are actually trying to make money. We created a rating system to help sort it out.

item.title: The NexPhone could already be the most important hardware launch of 2026 — here's why
item.description: Windows 11 in your pocket — why I think the NexPhone is the wake-up call that Microsoft desperately needs.

item.title: I tried the ‘world’s smallest’ noise-cancelling earbuds — and the size isn’t even the most mind-blowing thing about them
item.description: JLab's JBuds Mini ANC are very small, but very mighty.

item.title: You could wait for the Galaxy S26 – or perhaps, you could get four free Galaxy S25s with this deal at Verizon while it lasts
item.description: Get four free phones on a very affordable unlimited plan

item.title: Matière noire, expansion, fin de l’Univers : Euclid s’attaque aux plus grandes énigmes du cosmos
item.description: L'Univers est en expansion depuis environ 13,7 milliards d'années, cependant, contrairement à ce que l'on attendait, cette expansion de l'espace n'est pas en décélération depuis le Big Bang, mais en accélération depuis environ 7 milliards d'années. On pense que ce phénomène est gouverné par une...

item.title: ICE has killed another person in Minneapolis
item.description: Federal agents in Minneapolis repeatedly punched a man, forced him to the ground, and then shot him multiple times. The man was later pronounced dead. This is just the latest incident of deadly violence involving ICE, which has grown increasingly frequent, especially on the streets of Minneapolis. It's been less than three weeks since an […]

item.title: Dyson Wash G1 : ce laveur de sols balai très efficace devient bien plus recommandable quand il est soldé à -52 %
item.description: Efficace, maniable et facile à entretenir, le Dyson Wash G1 est une belle réussite de la part de la marque, qui s'est lancée, avec lui, sur le marché des balais laveurs de sols en 2024. Deux ans après, on le trouve à 339 euros au lieu de 699 euros pendant les soldes d'hiver chez Boulanger et sur Amazon.

item.title: NTSB will investigate why Waymo's robotaxis are illegally passing school buses
item.description: Waymo has caught the attention of the National Transportation Safety Board as the federal agency launched an official investigation into the company for its robotaxis improperly passing school buses in Austin, Texas. The NTSB said on X that it would "examine the interaction between Waymo vehicles and school buses stopped for loading and unloading students." The latest federal probe stems from a preliminary evaluation by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration that looked into how Waymo reacts to stopped school buses in the Texas city. That report led to Waymo's voluntary software re...

item.title: Gaming’s most fun sales data is full of old and obscure games
item.description: Every month, Circana video game analyst Mat Piscatella posts fascinating data about video game sales on Bluesky, highlighting trends like November's historically bad month for game hardware and Battlefield 6's big launch in October. But he doesn't just share data about what is selling the most; as of late, he's also posted delightful lists of […]

item.title: How PopWheels helped a food cart ditch generators for e-bike batteries
item.description: PopWheels realized its battery swapping network could be used for more than food delivery workers who need to charge their e-bikes. Now, its planning for an "aggressive rollout" this summer.

item.title: Sam Raimi’s Ready to Let ‘Spider-Man 4’ Die and Move On
item.description: Fans have been dreaming of a Raimi-directed 'Spider-Man 4' for years, and it sounds like that'll remain a dream.

item.title: "It's literally worry-free" – Segway Navimow exec on the new technology that's going to take robot lawn mowers mainstream
item.description: This "foolproof" navigation tech is going to make lawnbots even more accessible.
